abstract: Triple Crown winner American Pharoah arrives at Monmouth Park for Haskell Invitational horse race.
lead_paragraph: The Triple Crown winner American Pharoah received star treatment as he arrived for the $1.75 million Haskell Invitational on Sunday at Monmouth Park.

headline.main: Rolling Out the Red Carpet for American Pharoah

snippet: The Triple Crown winner American Pharoah received star treatment as he arrived for the $1.75 million Haskell Invitational on Sunday at Monmouth Park.
